sentence: And on the House side, Trump gave to Harriet Hageman, who is running a primary challenge to Rep. Liz Cheney, R-Wyo.
title: Trump gave $1M to Meadows nonprofit weeks after Jan. 6 panel's creation

sentence: Among them: Rep. Jody Hice of Georgia, who voted against certifying the election on January 6 and is running in the Republican primary against Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger, who has defended the state's election results; and Harriet Hageman, a Republican primary challenger to Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney, who voted to impeach Trump for his actions on January 6 and is a member of the House select committee investigating the January 6 attack.
author: Eric Bradner
title: Trump's PAC gave $1 million to Meadows' non-profit weeks after House formed January 6 committee

sentence: If? because this week at a Washington fundraiser, over 100 House Republicans supported Cheney's main primary opponent, Harriet Hageman.
author: Myra Adams
title: America needs Liz Cheney

sentence: As Politico's Olivia Beavers wrote, Cawthorn showed up at a fundraiser on Wednesday night for Harriet Hageman, who is opposing Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) for the GOP nomination for Wyoming's one House seat after being endorsed by Donald Trump.
title: DKos Asheville Open Thread: He just can't stop
